column2: Goldman Sachs targets $1 bln in Japan renewable energy bonds TOKYO
column3: May 25 Goldman Sachs Group Inc  plans to establish a bond facility to target $1 billion in investment within the next few years in renewable energy projects in Japan
column4: people familiar with the plan said. ~

column2: Bangladesh Islamic State suspect worked for Coca-Cola unit - sources DHAKA
column3: May 25 One of two men arrested in Bangladesh as a suspected member of Islamic State was an IT manager at a subsidiary of Coca-Cola Co
column4: police and company sources told Reuters on Monday. ~
